alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:05AM AKST until February 22 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow, and blowing snow with low visibility occurring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Highway Summits will have winds gusting to 35 mph along with visibility one half mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley * WHEN...Until noon today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 35 mph over highway summits causing blowing snow with low visibility. Snow and winds will taper off this afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
